meanings.sent1: The artist's painting had a very liney appearance.
meanings.sent2: The notebook paper had a liney pattern on it.
meanings.sent3: The liney design on the shirt made it look like a zebra!
meanings.sent4: Her handwriting was so liney, it looked like a series of connected dots.
meanings.sent5: The sunset painted a liney silhouette across the horizon.

meanings.definition: Someone who works on a production line.
meanings.sent1: The liney at the factory assembled cars all day.
meanings.sent2: The liney carefully placed each item on the conveyor belt.
meanings.sent3: The liney joked with coworkers about the fast-moving conveyor belt.
meanings.sent4: The liney was like a well-oiled machine, never missing a beat.
meanings.sent5: The liney's job required precision and speed on the assembly line.

meanings.definition: A person who waits in line.
meanings.sent1: The liney patiently stood in line at the grocery store.
meanings.sent2: The liney chatted with others while waiting in line for tickets.
meanings.sent3: The liney pretended to be a statue while waiting in line at the amusement park.
meanings.sent4: The liney felt like a penguin waiting in line for fish.
meanings.sent5: The liney's favorite pastime was people-watching while in line.
